website_summaries.verdict: A good value on a dye-free detergent that won't irritate sensitive skin.
pros: Comes in a manageable sized container that is easy to pour
Non-perfumed, but has a fresh scent
This can be used to refill your bottle if needed, or used on its own
Cleans well at a good price
cons: The product is biodegradable, but the packaging is not

customer_reviews.title: I like this....cleans great...has a slight fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: This product is good at cleaning and I like it. But when the clothes are dried in a dryer it has an unexpected scentless aroma that is a little strange at first, probably because I’m so used to strong smelling detergents. So it doesn’t smell as ‘fresh’ as you might like. But the product does clean well, but strong stains like ketchup can remain. This detergent works better in combination with Oxyclean powder. There seems to be some type of scent in the formula. But, it’s a great price for the amount you get. Please mark if you find my review helpful. With gratitude, thank you so much. Hopefully this review can help others as well! :D
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: SO FAR I LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR I LOVE THIS. I stopped using DOWNEY or any SOFTNER and wanted to get rid of bad chemicals. So now after I use this to wash my clothes I put VINEGAR in my BLEACH area and Fabric Softener area. It washes out the SOAP and SANITIZES your LAUNDRY
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Great Packing in the Box
customer_reviews.text: Good refills or to use as is. I was really impressed with the packaging in the box each one is seperated by a divider.
customer_reviews.author: Dakuyellow

customer_reviews.title: Not really saving any plastic waste
customer_reviews.text: I bought these refill bags of detergent to try and cut down on plastic waste. What I didn't think about was that the packaging was probably more wasteful using the cardboard box and then each plastic bag of detergent. I just think there has to be a way to limit the waste produced by the detergent bottles or bags and then send them like bags of milk in a larger thinner plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: David S Foster

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Wish the packaging could be recycled.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite detergent. It works well and I love that it has no scent. Arrived in fine condition. It's nice that the packaging is minimal and thus takes less energy to produce. However, it kills me that you can't recycle the packaging. Star removed on otherwise perfect product because of non-recyclability.
customer_reviews.author: Bleucie

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 3 Packages Leaked (Wasted)
customer_reviews.text: was very excited to order my favorite laundry detergent & downey april fresh in smart packaging. the downey arrived fine. the arm & hammer leaked an entire 1 of 3 packages onto my kitchen floor before i realized. so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid cleaning results and no skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: If you're prone toward allergic reactions to perfume and dye added to detergent, try this. I've used it for two years without a single episode of hives or itching. It does get out odors and most grime - even horse barn dirt and sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs & Horses

customer_reviews.title: Subscribe and Save 10% more
customer_reviews.text: Great packaging alternative to the normal big plastic jug. Good for those with sensitive skin and allergies. No issues, it cleans the clothes without an overpowering smell. Because there is no smell unless you have stinky clothes! If you DO have stinky clothes look into throwing in some Arm & Hammer Baking Soda with the load of laundry and it will kill that smell too!
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Cstmr

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, I have read a few reviews stating theirs came leaking. I have ordered these about 4 times now over the past couple years and have never head any leaking issue with THIS product. I don't have sensitivities to detergents but this is my favorite detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Leaked in box, but one step better in solving plastic dilemma.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that one of these leaked inside the shipping box. Luckily, it did not seem to leak through the box and onto my floor! I like the idea of receiving the detergent in this type of packaging, though. It takes up less space than the plastic bottles in our landfills and oceans. Not perfect solution, but getting better.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L.

customer_reviews.title: We like the detergent it's just not available
customer_reviews.text: We like this detergent quite well and have been using it regularly however due to the coronavirus and everything that's happening in the world apparently this laundry detergent along with many others is no longer obtainable. We had it on subscription service and we started getting low and then were informed that it was not available. Not sure if everybody was hoarding this detergent along with toilet paper, Perhaps we will revisit using it again when they come up with a cure for the coronavirus.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be a great deal. I don't itch and clothes seem clean. I bought my first Jan 1st 2019 and am just now ordering in June. I am single so keep that in mind. The bags kinda suck but I was lucky I had not finished my last bottle and just used it.
customer_reviews.author: Omadna

customer_reviews.title: Clean clothes and no flair up’s
customer_reviews.text: My wife saw this and wanted me to try. I suffer from extreme eczema and standard detergents flair my skin. 3 months of use and I’m sold. We ordered more to not ever run out. If you have sensitive skin give it a try you will be pleased. My clothes are clean and soft also.
customer_reviews.author: Potatohero

customer_reviews.title: A new Necessity
customer_reviews.text: Firstly are time trying this product, and I'm pretty sure it will not be my last. Excellent value, perfect for sensitivity, and cleans good. Glad I tried it, and highly likely to make it my go to laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My clothes are really clean and soft. Has no odor. It is not giving me any kind of irritation anywhere on my body. Worth the price. I definitely recommend this product for anyone who has bad reactions to laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: peppercorn

customer_reviews.title: Busted bag
customer_reviews.text: One of the bags broke in shipping and there’s detergent all over everything. It’s a fine product (my favorite laundry detergent) but this packaging is no good...
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: A good deal on laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: This is good laundry soap and doesn't imbue your clothes with some artificial scent. It is good for skin irritations that occur from some of the smelly stuff, at least for me. This method of packaging reduces the overall waste.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't need to keep a container to refill
customer_reviews.text: You don't have to use them as refills. they work great as they are. Definitely very little smell. Not sure on rating for endocrine disruption but if your main concern is ensitivity to scented soaps this is a good choice
customer_reviews.author: Chrissee

customer_reviews.title: 💘 the package and concept 💘 should be used as the standard
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. Purchased these refills types of the Gain version before. Love the space savings packaging. I think ALL the detergents should be sold in these recyclable, possibly reusable, space (landfill and mess) saving "bottle". 💘 it
customer_reviews.author: Tai Burns

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using pods. These are smaller than others I've seen so I wasn't sure if they'd do the job. But...Wow! My clothes are cleaner than with the liquid I had been using for a long time. I'm a convert! I like the fact that the pods are small. That helps with storage space. The packaging helps with that too. And they're so dang easy to use. Just toss 'em in the washer...no more drippy liquid!
customer_reviews.author: Dani Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, no scent, proficient detergent environmentally friendly containers
customer_reviews.text: Cleans great with out a sent; as advertised. The packaging is environmentally friendly; plus divided into three separate convenient containers.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for plastic containers
customer_reviews.text: I got these bags of detergent because I read about how much plastic is used in the thick plastic containers that are usually sold at stores. These were a better deal as well, and they've worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Laren

customer_reviews.title: Great Detergent
customer_reviews.text: Great deal great product! Bags a little awkward to handle but no biggy. Use with a 1/4c measure
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love arm and hammer !
customer_reviews.text: Love the refills ! Keep adding to bottles I had ! I use this on all our clothes chore clothes, and good - all the same result
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the eco friendly option it seems.
customer_reviews.text: I like the detergent, but I'm kind of embarrassed that I bought less detergent for more money than usual, and couldn't even recycle the containers afterward. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Not your Neuro-Typical family

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle for over people
customer_reviews.text: Out of everything the packaging is our favorite part of ordering this type of detergent. It's easy to pick up and pour.
customer_reviews.author: spacklewoof

customer_reviews.title: Non recyclable pouch!
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for something that was more environmentally sensitive. Wrong! The pouches are not recyclable. Worse than the big plastic jugs. Shame P&G! Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Perfume and Dye Free He Liquid Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. Great product. Have this detergent before. Really like.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Thrift

customer_reviews.title: Refill laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love how can refill container have & waste less space in recycle can.
customer_reviews.author: TAZ

customer_reviews.title: Detergent itself is fine, but odd packaging.
customer_reviews.text: On the "it was my mistake" side, I did think somehow this was POWDER in pouches. So was surprised when it was liquid - but that part was my fault for not reading up on it better before ordering. That said - it's just, well, "weird" to use liquid out of a pouch this way. I have one roommate and they've already made a mess with it. The detergent itself seems to work ok and cleans fine... I just can't get a handle on liquid in a pouch. I honestly do think however, that powder in one of these containers might work better.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensative skin.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't clean clothes well and gave my daughter a rash. She has sensitive skin and this made her flare up. Went back to either all or tide
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Lower priced refills of detergent for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: These refills are economical. Full of dye and perfume free detergent, at a lower price
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my daughters cloth diapers and it works great and perfect for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love how this is small and portable not to menchion good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: breonna b.

customer_reviews.title: 😐
customer_reviews.text: Works well but doesn’t last the number of loads advertised
customer_reviews.author: Yeggi W.

customer_reviews.title: 33 loads? In what universe?
customer_reviews.text: The detergent is ok I guess but my gripe is with the "load count" on the packaging. Each bag says it's good for 33 loads, but you'll be lucky to get even 10 large (not even extra large) loads out of each bag. So instead of 99 loads (yeah right!) you get 30 on a good day.
customer_reviews.author: Scoot

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Best unscented laundry detergent. Easy packaging to refill pump dispenser. Have had no issues with our family’s sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great feeling
customer_reviews.text: Great deal I just poured them into a previous bottle
customer_reviews.author: T. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Worth the bags
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! Fragrance free, no skin irritations or headaches. And it lasts me forever! I wind up sharing what I have cuz it's just SO MUCH. Coming back for more. I love knowing that my laundry will be clean and my guinea pigs will be safe, too.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Gaither

customer_reviews.title: Eliminate plastic
customer_reviews.text: Love this product because it comes in a pouch. Less plastic, and clean fresh clothes!
customer_reviews.author: COLLETTE JIMENEZ

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect purchase so much better to but these than to go to the market to it pick up!!!
customer_reviews.author: MoSuave

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Great price fast delivery good brand to clean your clothes with .
customer_reviews.author: BeAlishuz

customer_reviews.title: Clean clothes, light scent, no skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent, we all have sensitive skin and this works great. Leaves the clothes clean, light scent, no skin irritation...I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kedra S Todd

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've used this detergent for like 5 years, it's great. Having these bags is a little cheaper than buying a whole new container.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Froberg

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy this again...and again...
customer_reviews.text: I love the packaging...helps save on excess plastic, so good for environment. I use this because of the scent and dye free aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mckellar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kids laundry. My stepson has skin issues and everything is due & fragrance free. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenAE1

customer_reviews.title: Love the Price
customer_reviews.text: cheap and convenient packages. I love it since they are for sensitive skin people.
customer_reviews.author: Reinaldo Rolon

customer_reviews.title: Our clothes are clean!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product- my family has sensitive skin and our laundry is not only clean by come out with a fresh simple clean smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa rieder

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin must have
customer_reviews.text: These refills are amazing. Just pour in empty bottle. Love this product
customer_reviews.author: kimberly t.

customer_reviews.title: one of pouch was ripped and the box was mess
customer_reviews.text: When we received this product, one of pouch was ripped open, and the detergent was everywhere in the box. This product itself is good though
customer_reviews.author: YN

customer_reviews.title: Unscented Detergent for Nursing School
customer_reviews.text: Stellar! Great price at $13 dollars. I used it to clean my nursing uniform and my clothes were noticeably whiter. I smeared some of the detergent on the collar area (where it's bound to start looking brown), and it came out white as snow! I bought some compression socks on Amazon too. They smelled like straight vinegar so I chucked them in the wash. I put my nose to them as soon as they were done, and they smelled like sweet nothing :) 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tyla

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money! I ordered this on February 2nd and it's now June 14th and I'm on my last container. It washes well without causing itching or irritation. There is virtually no scent. I also mixed it with Oxi to boost stain removing capabilities. I use an old tide cap and put 1 cap full a load. Also they fill the containers as much as possible they're not skimpy on the amount of soap. As you can see from the picture my thumb is holding the spot at the level where the remaining soap is.
customer_reviews.author: FE

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working
customer_reviews.text: So far this seems to be working. I take care of a person with incontinence. I use this with ammonia and is seems to get rid of the odor. Sometimes I have to wash things twice but I have yet to find a detergent where I do not have to wash things twice. I also like the fact that there is no weird scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great product has lasted over 3 months of diaper washes (which I wouldn’t suggest using it for TBH) and baby clothes. My newborn twins haven’t had any reactions to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin great value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value. I like that you can use these as a refill or stand alone. Works great. My skin is sensitive to scented detergents, this product works great and no itchy aftermath.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Actually has a fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Has a fragrance. Clothing dries fragrance free. Found that the soda does a decent job of deodorizing socks, better than other things I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Renewed

customer_reviews.title: Do these people sleep at night?
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I don’t even know how they dare sell this product and go on with their lives. How disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: No reaction! :)
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin and these don’t bother me at all! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sliceolyfe

customer_reviews.title: Gets clothes clean in cold water
customer_reviews.text: It takes very little detergent which produces great Suds in cold wate; clothes get clean, and do not cause itchy skin.
customer_reviews.author: CHN

customer_reviews.title: Reordered
customer_reviews.text: This is a regular buy for me—good price and lasts months. Works as expected for sensitive skin. No real scent to it though as expected.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Murrell

customer_reviews.title: I 'm confident using "Arm and Hammer" products.it.
customer_reviews.text: My laundry will get done on time now, thank you..
customer_reviews.author: Jean Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works for sensitive skin. Clothes come out clean and non irritating.
customer_reviews.author: mich8589

customer_reviews.title: Better than All
customer_reviews.text: I was using All Free & Clear prior to trying this. This works much better at getting the smells out of my clothes. This is the second time I’ve purchased it and I will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: minivanmom

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use bags vs big heavy plastic bottle
customer_reviews.text: I like these bags vs the big plastic jug. Easy for me to lift while dealing with right arm weakness
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Cool stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent. When I was pregnant, I couldnt stand different odors and used everything with no scents. It cleans and just good detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to pour from or refill a jug with.
customer_reviews.author: BammerMom

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the pouches! easier to open and pour, especially with arthritic hands! price was right too- will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Judy H.

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived great. Thank you! Love this stuff for my sensitive skin. I don’t use any other detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good idea!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Too many plastic containers!!! This helps! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was making my own detergent...
customer_reviews.text: ... until I found this. So far so good. No skin reactions!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Non-allergenic
customer_reviews.text: Always choosing non-allergenic products. This is a winner for me!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J. Moff

product_meta.title: Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Free & Clear, 99 Loads Total Laundry Detergent Pouches, 3 pack, 50 Fl oz each
product_meta.description: Style:Sensitive SkinSpecially formulated and dermatologist tested for sensitive skin. Now available in an Easy-Pour pouch - refill your Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Free detergent bottle or measure directly from the pouch. It contains Baking Soda, and is tough on stains yet gentle on your clothes and your skin. Special, lower-sudsing formula rinses clean and is designed to work in both standard machines and today's energy conscious High Efficiency (HE) models. Free of perfumes and dyes. Pouches not labeled for individual sale.
feature_bullets: Tough on stains, gentle on skin
Clean rinse with low-suds formula, works in standard and High Efficiency (HE) models

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
